attributes.action: Allow campsites to open fully from 12th April including their facility blocks
attributes.additional_details: Other sectors re-opening are being allowed to open their toilet facilities such as pubs, zoo's, theme parks, tourist attractions etc. Campsites operated covid secure WC facilities throughout last season and were exceptionally safe - campsite WC blocks are all cubicle toilets and showers and with covid secure measures in place are very safe and certainly more safe than general public toilet facilities which are being allowed to open.
attributes.background: Allow camping and caravan sites to open fully on the 12th April in line with other sectors. Currently campsites are allowed to open on the 12th April without their toilet/shower facilities.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578833
